Home > external > combineMetaCycKEGGModels.m

combineMetaCycKEGGModels

PURPOSE

combineMetaCycKEGGModels

SYNOPSIS

function model=combineMetaCycKEGGModels(metacycModel,keggModel)

DESCRIPTION 

 combineMetaCycKEGGModels
   Combine MetaCyc and KEGG draft models into one model structure.

   model     a model structure generated by integrating information
             from draft models reconstructed using MetaCyc and KEGG
             databases. The 'rxnFrom/metFrom/geneFrom' fields are
             included to indicate the source.

   Usage: model=combineMetaCycKEGGModels(metacycModel,keggModel)

   Hao Wang, 2017-11-16

CROSS-REFERENCE INFORMATION

This function calls:
This function is called by:

0001 function model=combineMetaCycKEGGModels(metacycModel,keggModel)
0002 % combineMetaCycKEGGModels
0003 %   Combine MetaCyc and KEGG draft models into one model structure.
0004 %
0005 %   model     a model structure generated by integrating information
0006 %             from draft models reconstructed using MetaCyc and KEGG
0007 %             databases. The 'rxnFrom/metFrom/geneFrom' fields are
0008 %             included to indicate the source.
0009 %
0010 %   Usage: model=combineMetaCycKEGGModels(metacycModel,keggModel)
0011 %
0012 %   Hao Wang, 2017-11-16
0013 %
0014 
0015 %Just return the model
0016 if nargin<2
0017     disp('Missing input model');
0018     return;
0019 end
0020 
0021 %Add MetaCyc model as template
0022 model=metacycModel;
0023 model.id='COMBINED';
0024 model.description='Combined model from MetaCyc and KEGG draft models';
0025 
0026 %Use MetaCyc model as template
0027 model.rxnFrom=cell(numel(model.rxns),1);
0028 model.rxnFrom(:)={'MetaCyc'};
0029 model.metFrom=cell(numel(model.mets),1);
0030 model.metFrom(:)={'MetaCyc'};
0031 model.geneFrom=cell(numel(model.genes),1);
0032 model.geneFrom(:)={'MetaCyc'};
0033 model.grRulesKEGG=cell(numel(model.rxns),1);
0034 model.grRulesKEGG(:)={''};
0035 
0036 %Remove the S and rxnGeneMat matrix
0037 if isfield(model,'S')
0038     model=rmfield(model,'S');
0039 end
0040 if isfield(model,'rxnGeneMat')
0041     model=rmfield(model,'rxnGeneMat');
0042 end
0043 
0044 %Arrange the genes related fields
0045 
0046 %Shared genes between KEGG and MetaCyc
0047 sharedGenes=intersect(keggModel.genes,model.genes);
0048 [a, b]=ismember(sharedGenes,model.genes);
0049 model.geneFrom(b)={'Both'};
0050 
0051 %Add unique genes from KEGG and update geneFrom
0052 C=setdiff(keggModel.genes,model.genes);
0053 model.genes=[model.genes;C];
0054 geneFrom=cell(numel(C),1);
0055 geneFrom(:)={'KEGG'};
0056 model.geneFrom=[model.geneFrom;geneFrom];
0057 
0058 %Prepare for matching grRules
0059 if isfield(keggModel,'grRules');
0060     keggModel.grRules=strrep(keggModel.grRules,'(','');
0061     keggModel.grRules=strrep(keggModel.grRules,')','');
0062 end
0063 
0064 %Replace rxns in KEGG model with the corresponding ones in MetaCyc.
0065 %by updating values rxns field to MetaCyc version whenever possible.
0066 
0067 %Collect the ones found in MetaCyc as mappedRxns
0068 mappedRxns=[];
0069 rxnsToMove=[];
0070 grRulesToMove={}; %Storing the grRules to be moved to metacyc model
0071 
0072 %Read in dbLinks, note that linkMetaCycKEGGRxns need to be run in advance
0073 load('metaCycRxns.mat');
0074 num=0;
0075 numToMove=0;
0076 %Loop through the KEGG model and replace the rxn id from KEGG to MetaCyc version
0077 for i=1:numel(keggModel.rxns)
0078         [a, b]=ismember(rxnLinks.kegg,keggModel.rxns{i});
0079         I=find(b);
0080         
0081         if numel(I)==1
0082                 %Find out the corresponding MetaCyc reactions
0083                 num=num+1;
0084                 %Record the mapped rxn index in kegg model and remove them later
0085                 mappedRxns=[mappedRxns,i];
0086                 %keggModel.rxns{i}=rxnLinks.metacyc{I(1)};
0087 
0088                 [c, d]=ismember(rxnLinks.metacyc{I(1)},model.rxns);
0089                 if c
0090                         model.rxnFrom{d}='Both';
0091                         %Combine the grRule info
0092                         %Check if kegg grRules equals or a subset of metacyc grRules
0093                         %If not, save the kegg grRules to a new field grRulesKEGG for manual curation
0094                         k=strfind(model.grRules{d},keggModel.grRules{i});
0095                         if isempty(k)
0096                                 if isempty(model.grRulesKEGG{d})  
0097                                     model.grRulesKEGG{d}=keggModel.grRules{i};
0098                                 else
0099                                     model.grRulesKEGG{d}=strcat(model.grRulesKEGG{d},{' or '},keggModel.grRules{i});
0100                                 end
0101                         end
0102                 else
0103                         %For the KEGG rxns have MetaCyc version but not in MetaCyc draft model
0104                         [x, y]=ismember(rxnLinks.metacyc{I(1)},metaCycRxns.rxns);
0105                         
0106                         %Check if this reaction is repitetive and save the grRules
0107                         [Repeat, Index]=ismember(y,rxnsToMove);
0108                         if ~Repeat
0109                             rxnsToMove=[rxnsToMove;y];  %Record rxns to be moved from kegg to metacyc model
0110                             grRulesToMove=[grRulesToMove;keggModel.grRules{i}];
0111                             numToMove=numToMove+1;
0112                         else
0113                             %If this reaction has been recorded, append the grRules if it is different
0114                             k=strfind(grRulesToMove{Index},keggModel.grRules{i});
0115                             if isempty(k)
0116                                 grRulesToMove{Index}=strcat(grRulesToMove{Index},{' or '},keggModel.grRules{i});
0117                             end
0118                         end
0119                 end
0120         else        
0121                 %Here are the case of one kegg rxn id link to several MetaCyc ids
0122                 %for j=2:numel(I)
0123                     %Ignore this issue for now, and resolve it later, because it never happened
0124                     %This case can be solved by adding above section into a loop below
0125                     %disp(I(j));
0126                 %end
0127         end
0128 end
0129 fprintf('NOTE: A total of %d reactions in the KEGG model were mapped to MetaCyc.\n',num);
0130 fprintf('NOTE: %d reactions already in MetaCyc model, %d will be combined.\n',num-numToMove,numToMove);
0131 
0132 %Append mapped metacyc rxns in kegg model that are absent from metacyc model
0133 rxnFrom=cell(numel(rxnsToMove),1);
0134 rxnFrom(:)={'KEGG'};
0135 model.rxnFrom=[model.rxnFrom;rxnFrom];
0136 model.rxns=[model.rxns;metaCycRxns.rxns(rxnsToMove)];
0137 
0138 rxnNames=metaCycRxns.rxnNames(rxnsToMove);
0139 %Replace rxnNames with those from metaCycEnzymes
0140 load('metaCycEnzymes.mat');
0141 for i=1:numel(rxnsToMove)
0142     [a, b]=ismember(metaCycRxns.rxns{rxnsToMove(i)},metaCycEnzymes.rxns);
0143     if a
0144         rxnNames{i}=metaCycEnzymes.rxnNames{b};
0145     end
0146 end
0147 model.rxnNames=[model.rxnNames;rxnNames];

0157 model.c=[model.c;metaCycRxns.c(rxnsToMove)];

0166 %Remove all mapped reactions from KEGG model
0167 pureKeggModel=removeReactions(keggModel,mappedRxns,true,true);
0168 fprintf('NOTE: A shrinked KEGG model with %d reactions and %d metabolites was obtained.\n',numel(pureKeggModel.rxns),numel(pureKeggModel.mets));
0169 
0170 %Replace mets information in kegg model with the corresponding ones in MetaCyc
0171 %This includes updating all metabolite-related fields, except S matrix.
0172 load('metaCycMets.mat');
0173 
0174 if ~isfield(pureKeggModel,'metCharges')
0175         pureKeggModel.metCharges=zeros(numel(pureKeggModel.mets),1);
0176 end
0177 
0178 num=0;
0179 for i=1:numel(pureKeggModel.mets)
0180         [a, b]=ismember(pureKeggModel.mets{i},metaCycMets.keggid);
0181         if a
0182                 %For now only replace the met ids
0183                 num=num+1;
0184                 pureKeggModel.mets{i}=metaCycMets.mets{b};
0185                 %Record the replaced mets into a vector for later
0186         end    
0187 end
0188 fprintf('NOTE: A total of %d metabolites from the shrinked KEGG model were mapped to MetaCyc again.\n',num);
0189 
0190 %Generate euqations for pureKeggModel
0191 equationStrings=constructEquations(pureKeggModel,'',false,false,false,true);
0192 
0193 %Add the pure KEGG reactions to MetaCyc model
0194 rxnFrom=cell(numel(pureKeggModel.rxns),1);
0195 rxnFrom(:)={'KEGG'};
0196 model.rxnFrom=[model.rxnFrom;rxnFrom];
0197 model.rxns=[model.rxns;pureKeggModel.rxns];
0198 model.equations=[model.equations;equationStrings];
0199 model.rxnNames=[model.rxnNames;pureKeggModel.rxnNames];

0264         [a, b]=ismember(model.mets{i},metaCycMets.mets);
0265         if a

0273                 num=num+1;
0274         else

0276                 if c
0277                     model.mets{i}=keggMets.mets{d};
